original_title: New Kelani Bridge reopened, after temporary closure
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The New Kelani Bridge which was temporarily closed was reopened from 6 am on Monday (04).
Police said the bridge will be closed again from 9 pm on the 8th of December till 6 am on the 11th of December, under the second phase.
As the third phase, the New Kelani Bridge will be closed from 9 pm on the 15th of December till 6 am on the 18th of December.
Police informed the public to use alternative routes during the period when the bridge will be closed.
Probation Centre Warden charged over death of child in Kalmunai, further remanded.
